item.description: IT teams who practice DevOps often use containers in their workflow. In such an environment "It works in my container" is a programmer excuse you may here more often than its popular predecessor "It works on my machine". A design for software developers

item.title: Six Stages of Debugging Funny Software Development Design Black Text
item.description: Debugging is a fact of life for productive software developers. The process of debugging computer code can be broken down into the 6 stages shown on this design. Sounds familiar? A design for programmers with a sense of humor. It's funny cause it's true

item.title: Debug Life White Typographic Design for Thug Programmers
item.description: Dealing with bugs is part of a programmer's life. These recurring little creatures can be daunting, yet hopefully you still enjoy programming and take your constant struggle with bugs with a sense of humor. A typographic design for thug computer program
